label: Paint and Decorating Supplies
description: Supplies for painting and decorating homes and other surfaces.
intents: Learn how to paint a room

subcategories.label: Interior Paint
subcategories.description: Paint for indoor surfaces such as walls and ceilings.

subcategories.label: Exterior Paint
subcategories.description: Paint for outdoor surfaces such as walls and fences.

subcategories.label: Specialty Paint
subcategories.description: Paint for specific surfaces or purposes.

subcategories.label: Painting Supplies
subcategories.description: Supplies needed for painting such as brushes, rollers, and tape.

subcategories.label: Decorating Supplies
subcategories.description: Supplies needed for decorating such as wallpaper and stencils.
